sentences.sContent: Powell did not know why it was he had resolved to keep his own counsel as to his colloquy with Mr Smith.
sentences.sContent_eng: Powell did not know why it was he had resolved to keep his own counsel as to his colloquy with Mr Smith.
sentences.sCn: 鲍威尔不知道为什么决定要把他跟史密斯先生的谈话保守秘密。

synos.tran: 以对话体写的文章；谈话，会话

remMethod.val: col (共同) + loqu (说) + y → 谈话， 会话

words.tran: 白话的；通俗的；口语体的
白话，口语；口语体；方言用语
